Spells:
Alarm (W1 Abju): R30' Entry into a 20' cube by a non-designated creature triggers an audible or mental alarm for 8 hr [R]
Beacon Of Hope (C3 Abju): R30' Targets gain Adv on Wisdom and death saves and maximum HP from healing for conc up to 1 min
Blade Ward (W0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Bless (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets gain +1d4 on attacks and saving throws for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Blight (C4 [Blood Domain] Necr): R30' target suffers 8d8 HP necrotic (Constitution half; plant target suffers Disadv and maximum damage on failure) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Blindness/Deafness (C2 Necr): R30' Inflicts choice of blindness or deafness on target (Constitution ends) for 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Control Water (C4 Tran): R300' 100' water rises 20', parts, redirects, or whirlpools for conc up to 10 min
Create Undead (C6 Necr): R10' 3 corpses become obedient (R120') ghouls for 1 dy [+Level creates 4 ghouls/5 ghouls or 2 ghasts or wights/6 ghouls, 3 ghasts or wights, or 2 mummies at level 7/8/9]
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for conc up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Evil And Good (C5 Abju): Celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead suffer Disadv on self attacks for conc up to 1 min and a successful spell attack returns them to their home plane (Charisma neg); self touch ends enchantment, fright, or possession by them
Dominate Person (C5 [Blood Domain] Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wisdom neg; damage yields another save) for conc up to 1 min [+Level extends duration to 10 min/1 hr/8 hr at level 6/7/8]
Etherealness (C7 Tran): Self enters Ethereal Plane for up to 8 hr [+Level affects +2/+5 targets at level 8/9]
False Life (C1 [Blood Domain] Necr): Self gains 1d4+4 temporary HP for 1 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary HP]
Freedom Of Movement (C4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments for 1 hr
Geas (C5 Ench): R60' Target carries out self instructions (Wisdom neg) for 30 dy [+Level extends duration to 1 yr/permanent at level 7/9]
Guardian Of Faith (C4 Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (Dexterity half) for 8 hr or 60 HP
Guidance (C0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc up to 1 min
Guiding Bolt (C1 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP radiant and gives Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Hallow (C5 Evoc): 60' radius becomes warded against celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and their effects and evokes a boon effect
Haste (C3 [Blood Domain] Tran): R30' Willing target gains dbl Speed, +2 AC, Adv on Dexterity, and an additional action for conc up to 1 min
Hold Monster (C5 [Blood Domain] Ench): R90' Immobilizes target creature (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Person (C2 [Blood Domain] Ench): R60' Immobilizes target humanoid (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Holy Aura (C8 Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain Adv on saves, inflict Disadv on attackers, and blind successful fiend and undead melee attackers (Constitution neg)
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (Dexterity neg) for 1 hr
Mass Heal (C9 Evoc): R60' Targets regain 700 HP total and recover from blindness, deafness, and disease
Planar Ally (C6 Conj): R60' Self may bargain for service from an otherworldly entity
Protection From Poison (C2 Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains Adv on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Ray Of Enfeeblement (C2 [Blood Domain] Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts half damage with Strength weapons (Constitution ends) for conc up to 1 min
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc up to 1 min
Resurrection (C7 Necr): Restores life and full HP to a willing touched 100-year-old corpse, removing all diseases and poisons
Revivify (C3 Necr): Restores life and 1 HP to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Target suffers 4d8 HP radiant (Dexterity neg)
Sleep (C1 [Blood Domain] Ench): R90' 20' radius sleeps 5d8 HP of creatures, weakest first, for 1 min (damage or shaking wakens) [+Level affects +2d8 HP of creatures]
Slow (C3 [Blood Domain] Tran): R120' 6 targets in a 40' cube suffer half Speed, -2 AC and Dexterity saves, and no more than 1 action/rd (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Spare The Dying (C0 Necr): Touched creature becomes stable
Spiritual Weapon (C2 Evoc): R60' Spectral weapon inflicts 1d8+2 HP and moves 20' for 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP/2 levels]
Stoneskin (C4 [Blood Domain] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc up to 1 hr
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 W0 spells/May cast chosen W1 spell 1/long rest
Blood Puppet: R60' May use Channel Divinity to force a Huge target to move at half speed and attack or to interact with an object (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Bloodletting Focus: Harming spells inflict +(spell level + 2) HP necrotic
Crimson Bond: May use Channel Divinity to bond with seen target or target blood; knows distance, direction, HP, and conditions for conc up to 1 hr and may suffer 2d6 HP necrotic to share sight or sound (Constitution neg) for 2 min
Divine Intervention: 100% chance to gain help from deity 1/wk
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Sanguine Recall: May suffer up to 10d8 HP necrotic to recover an equal number of spell levels (level 6 max) 1/long rest
